name: bobs quest for savings
description:
bobs wants to get a new xbox but a dungeon stole all his money! help bob get it back by getting inside that dungeon!!!!! instructions

use the arrow keys to move bob. shift to make him jump! avoid enemys and get all the money!

to restart press R. and to quit press esc

note: if your anti virus flags it as a virus then it is a false alarm.
